document_data.mainbody:
Essimuths Equipment was a shop that sold tools and adventuring gear located in Waterdeep during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
The building stood two stories tall.
Essimuths Equipment was located in the central section of Waterdeeps Southern Ward within the Adventurers Quarter where Weeping Maidens Run joined Slop Street next door to the Temple of Good Cheer.
The shop was owned and run by Essimuth in the .
